ai-tha-ap157:2.2_0: by means of the Realized Ones,
ai-tha-ap157:3.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap157:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap157:4.1_0: Even if there are ten eons
ai-tha-ap157:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap157:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Flame Tree flowers.
ai-tha-ap157:7.1_0: As a jasmine with its fifth flowers,
